quests.name: Bring me some apples
quests.questIntroductionLine:
Hello, my dear boy. Could you bring me two apples? 
I need them for my apple pie.
quests.questNotFinishedLine:
Take your time. I need good quality apples 
for my apple pie.
quests.questFinishedLine:
Great job, my dear boy. 
I think you deserve something for that.
